title: Midnight Reflections
description: An ambient electronic piece exploring themes of solitude and introspection. Created during my final semester using Ableton Live and various synthesizers.

title: Urban Pulse
description: A hip-hop beat with jazz influences, featuring live saxophone recordings. Collaborated with local musicians for this hobbyist project.

title: Digital Dreams
description: Experimental IDM track created entirely with software synthesizers. Explores complex polyrhythms and evolving textures.

title: Acoustic Sessions Vol. 1
description: A collection of acoustic guitar recordings with subtle electronic processing. Recorded in my home studio during quarantine.
